name: wiredoor
description: Wiredoor is a self-hosted WireGuard management panel that provides a web UI for configuring peers, networks, and access rules. It aims to simplify VPN orchestration and monitoring across multiple WireGuard endpoints.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Add, edit, and remove WireGuard peers through an intuitive web interface

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Generate QR codes for mobile clients to quickly import VPN configurations

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View connected peers and their status in a centralized dashboard

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Define rules and permissions to control which peers can access specific resources

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Export peer configurations for manual deployment or backup purposes

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Secure the management interface with user accounts and role-based access
